title: Missing Emotes
body: Apparently Riot is giving back old emotes, such as the Dawn and Chaos emotes. I know for a fact i had the Dawn emote during the event but i have yet to see it in my inventory now. Am i missing something?

replies.body: In order to get those event emotes you needed to have crafted the Nightfall Icon or the Daybreak Icon. This account doesn't seem to have obtained those during the event which is why you haven't had the emotes unlocked.
